noteArray.text:
You can have a voice, performance, pattern or song.
In master mode, find a patch you can overwrite.
Press memory.
Now select a voice, performance, pattern or song.
Select a patch to save.
Press store.
press enter twice.
To give it a name.
Press Edit.
Change name.
Press store.
Enter twice.

Midi in/out. Midi or USB.
utility => midi => other => midi In/out USB or Midi.
Ultility => MIDI => Switch => Local Contol => Off OR ON.

You can name a voice, performance, pattern, song or master patch.

To give it a name.
Press Edit.
Change name.
Press store.
Enter twice.

Mixing => Edit => Effect => Turn 1 off.
Now You Can Select AD and turn it on.
Now Use Connect, INS A, INS B to set the sound.
Don't forget to set the A/D INPUT Switch on the keyboard to on.

Mixing => Effect => INS SW 
Now You Can Select AD and turn it on.

To set the sound:
Press A/D IN
Now Use Connect, INS A, INS B to set the sound.
Don't forget to set the A/D INPUT Switch on the keyboard to on.

Mixing => Edit => Effect => Turn 1 off.
Now You Can Select AD and turn it on.
Now Use Connect, INS A, INS B to set the sound.
Don't forget to set the A/D INPUT Switch on the keyboard to on.
Utility => VCE A/D => Connect or INSA or INSB

Utility
VCE A/D

Heavy Sound
INS A => DST AmpSim 1 
INS b =>  REV SPX Room

Clean Sound
INS A => CMP MltBndComp
INS b =>  CHO SPX Chorus
